channel.title: Custom item coming out as different
channel.description: Hello I am having trouble with a custom item I made. I followed this tutorial "[b]How to make/add your own Custom Items(Updated, 9 Steps,NEW DOWNLOAD LINKS) [TuT][/b]" by varmisher several times through and made my own custom weapon. When I go and add it into my server files though it comes out as different items depending on the id I make it. Is their an Id i can make it wear it will come out as the weapon I made it to be?? if it is not the id...what would be the problem. All help is appreciated.

item.title: Custom item coming out as different
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

Try changing the ID to a unused Item ID.

Read full topic
item.source: Custom item coming out as different

item.title: Custom item coming out as different
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

Hello I am having trouble with a custom item I made. I followed this tutorial “How to make/add your own Custom Items(Updated, 9 Steps,NEW DOWNLOAD LINKS) [TuT]” by varmisher several times through and made my own custom weapon. When I go and add it into my server files though it comes out as different items depending on the id I make it. Is their an Id i can make it wear it will come out as the weapon I made it to be?? if it is not the id…what would be the problem. All help is appreciated.

Read full topic
